title: Thresh Statue Damage Problem
body: Heya, I recently had my Thresh statue delivered and while removing the tape, one of the hands of the statue tumbled out. So I quickly made a support ticket and have yet to hear back, its been up since Monday, I don't mean to sound impatient, but I just wanted to know if it's normal for tickets to take this long, thanks for any help in advance.

replies.body: It really sucks to hear that a piece stumbled out, and we'd like to look into this!  I was able to confirm that your ticket has been received and is in queue to be reviewed by our Merch team.  There's currently a high volume, so it may be a bit to receive a response.  Hang tight until then and make sure not to reply to the ticket so you don't drop to the bottom of the queue.  We'll get back to you asap!
